SOURCES.CUS: CREATE TABLE CUS (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100),SURNAME VARCHAR(100), CARD_NUMBER INT,ID_NUMBER INT,STREET VARCHAR(100),STREET_NUMBER INT,BOOK_BORROWED VARCHAR(100),BOOK_BORROWED_ID INT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.LIB: CREATE TABLE LIB (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100)LIBRARY_ID INT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.LIB1: CREATE TABLE LIB1 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.LIB2: CREATE TABLE LIB2 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.SP3: CREATE TABLE SP3 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100), SURNMAME VARCHAR(255), CARD_ID INT, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(60),BOOK_ID BIGINT, CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.SP4: CREATE TABLE SP4 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100), SURNMAME VARCHAR(255), CARD_ID INT, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(60),BOOK_ID BIGINT, CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.TEST2: CREATE TABLE TEST2 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,LOST TINYINT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
SOURCES.TEST3: CREATE TABLE TEST3 (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, BOOK_TITLE VARCHAR(100),AUTHOR_NAME VARCHAR(100), EDITION INT,YEAR INT,ISSN_ISBN VARCHAR(100),LIBRARY_ID INT,LOST TINYINT,HOLD TINYINT,CREATE_USER INT, CREATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER INT, UPDATE_DATETIME TIMESTAMP);
